amendment.description: To affirm the Iraqi Government position of no amnesty for terrorists who have attacked U.S. forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4272 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 64 - 34. Record Vote Number: 177.

action.text: Amendment SA 4272 proposed by Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S5932-5933; text: CR S5932) To affirm the Iraqi Government position of no amnesty for terrorists who have attacked U.S. forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4272 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 64 - 34. Record Vote Number: 177.
